item.title: Gitlab on Ubuntu 16.04
item.description: Instalasi Gitlab di Ubuntu 16.04 Widya Gitlab https://widgitgog.birau.com/dashboard/projects change / update hostname sed -i 's/widgitgog/widgit/g' /etc/gitlab/gitlab.rb gitlab-ctl reconfigure gitlab-ctl restart https://docs.gitlab.com/omnibus/settings/configuration.html Referensi: https://www.howtoforge.com/tutorial/how-to-install-and-configure-gitlab-on-ubuntu-16-04/ https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-and-configure-gitlab-on-ubuntu-16-04
